item.title: About
item.description: My name is Guido Masella and I am a Physicists, coder, and GNU/Linux enthusiast. Phisics Currentely I am a post-doctoral researcher in the Quantum Matter Theory Group (QMT) at the Institut de Sciences et d’Ingénierie Supramoléculaires (ISIS) and University of Strasbourg I got my Master’s degree in Physics at University of Pisa in late 2015. For a short period in 2016 I worked as a trainee for the Italian National Council of Research (CNR) on an experiment employing ultracold atomic gases.
